lead_paragraph: Right-hander Tim Lincecum won the Golden Spikes Award as the top amateur player. Lincecum, the 10th overall draft pick by San Francisco, went 12-4 with a 1.94 E.R.A. and a Division I-leading 199 strikeouts.
snippet: Right-hander Tim Lincecum won the Golden Spikes Award as the top amateur player. Lincecum, the 10th overall draft pick by San Francisco, went 12-4 with a 1.94 E.R.A. and a Division I-leading 199 strikeouts.
